name: Remembag
description:
LD40 entry: Tribute to 40 past Ludum Dare themes

This is the post-jam version of my Ludum Dare 40 entry.

You have to remember the item of the current room and use it in the next room to proceed, while remembering the next needed item.

Future updates will probably include a random generator to have a different item set needed to open the doors.

Read the full description @ https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/remembag

Credits:
Music by: “Pixelland” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
